result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Arturo Rosas-Perez

defendant.name: Rosas-Perez, Arturo
defendant.address: 133 S Main St. Apt #1, Elmwood, WI 54027

records.addlTxt: Scheduling was done off the record. Case was not called. Jury trial was scheduled with interpreter Monica Marin
Status conference on September 6, 2022 at 10:00 am.

2:51 PM ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appeared via Zoom videoconferencing for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in Court with Arturo Rosas-Perez.  Includes 21CF158 & 22CF140.  Interpreter was scheduled via Zoom but did not appear.  Attorneys advise and agree that scheduling is the only thing needed and they feel they can proceed without interpreter.  Request Status with Judge in approximately thirty days.  Court confirms Defendant's address.  Adjourned at 2:56 PM
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 10:00 am.
from Court Commissioner Gavic granting ADA Schieffer's request to appear remotely.
Letter to Court with State's Request to Appear Remotely filed by ADA Schieffer.
Status conference on August 2, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

10:06 AM Defendant Arturo Rosas-Perez appears in Court,  ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Includes 22CF140 (PTC) and 21CF158 (STC). Interpreter Marie Marin. S/T. ADA Schieffer states Atty Perrin is on 21CF158 but has not yet accepted appointment on 22CF140. ADA Schieffer states Atty Perrin will be here on 8/2/22 and would like to schedule on that date. Court adjourned at 10:14 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
3:03 PM Defendant Arturo Rosas-Perez appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty K. Dipallito appears by phone, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin. Interpreter Mariana Kralewski. S/T.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Defendant understands charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Schieffer is requesting a $5,000.00 SIBS w/conditions of absolute sobriety, no objection. Court so orders. Waive the time limits. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:27 pm.
